DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to analyze the retinal arteries, to investigate the incidence, number, types, distribution and localization of cilioretinal arteries in the Hungarian Caucasian population.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Incidence of Cilioretinal Arteries in the Hungarian Population
DOC.criteria: Caucasian race Signed informed consent Optical media opacities of the eye
